skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.
Such utterly ludicrous, impossible geometry could not conceivably be the product of a sane mind; sight of it drives the untainted mad and melts their brains!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Ruin subtly corrupts a populace from the very depths of their souls; the resultant favour feeds the Dark Powers' servants and spurs them ever onwards.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fall at the touch of a Nurgle worshipper become accounted to that person's glory in Nurgle's realm
Even the wisest of the Lifeleeches knows that sometimes the life that must be paid is their own
The lives of those slain by a Lifeleech are tied to his unholy aura, trapped to serve his foul being.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Infected Captives.

skillTree.localised_description: A pox of unbridled energy, this fever has a cost that must be paid, even for an adherent of Nurgle
Diseases of the Grandfather become ever more potent under the skillful touch of the Lifeleech.
The more these Nurgle worshippers slay and kill, the greater the benefits from their diseased patron

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Miasma of Pestilence"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Miasma of Pestilence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Miasma of Pestilence Upgraded"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Stream of Corruption"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Stream of Corruption Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Stream of Corruption Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Curse of the Leper Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Curse of the Leper Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of the Leper Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Curse of the Leper Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Rancid Visitations"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Rancid Visitations Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Rancid Visitations Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants
Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants
Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Blight Boil Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Blight Boil Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Unusually subtle for one so foul, this one is skilled in spreading Nurgle's insanitary ways and words across the land.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one finds the enemy can barely stand to come near them, let alone attack.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When this one's countless lesions and warts finish weeping and harden up, a natural, protective carapace is left behind in their place.
If a population are confined to their toilets or beds at home they're not able to spread dissent and sedition as readily, if at all.

effects.description:
Infection cost to create a Plague: -10%
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ogres aside, being this large and ungainly would almost certainly kill most other creatures, but when you're beloved of the Urfather it is actually an advantage.
